text: The 2015 Ontario Mine Rescue Provincial Competition were held June 10–12 at the Fort Williams Gardens Arena, in Thunder Bay, Ontario. ==List of competing teams== ===Kirkland Lake District=== AuRico Gold - Young-Davidson Mine {| class="wikitable" |- !
